Package game.actors

Class ExchangeTrader

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.ExchangeTrader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FingerReaderEnia
public class ExchangeTrader extends Actor

Exchange Trader

Parent trader class for exchange trader type, allows subclasses to easily define what items can be exchanged for and what the trader accepts as currency to make the exchange

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor otherActor, String direction, GameMap map)
      This method returns sell actions for every sellable weapon in otherActor inventory and exchange action if other actor has the item that can be used to exchange.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Actor
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the Actor that can interact with the merchant
      direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor, set in the location exits and passed into processActorTurn in world game loop
      map - current GameMap
      Returns:
      list of actions the other actor can perform with this trader
